From: (USANYS)"  
To: "ME 
(ODAG)"  
Subject: Re: DAG 
Memos 
Date: Fri, 24 May 2019 02:36:47 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Great. Many thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On May 23, 2019, at 9:17 PM, 
(ODAG) < 
> wrote: 
Thank you, and have conveyed 
the memos. 
On May 23, 2019, at 11:10AM, (USANYS) < wrote: 
Here are the two memos for your briefing with Ed of the DAG, one from Geoff and the other from me on the recusal 
matters. 
After you and I spoke, we realized that we should add Epstein and we have done so. 
As always, please feel free to call with any comments or questions. 
<SDNY Memo 
to DAG.GSB.cases.5.23.19.final.pdf> 
<SDNY Memo 
to DAG - GSB Recused.5.23.19.Finaldocx.pdf> 
EFTA00022482
